title: Business Council
copy: Members of the Business Council are committed to strengthening the partnership between Chicago’s civic and cultural champions. The Art Institute is grateful to these corporate leaders who support access to a world of art for our wide-ranging audiences.   Honorary Chairs Denise B. Gardner Chair of the Board of Trustees Darrel Hackett President, BMO Private Bank—US BMO Harris Bank   Members Dale Taylor President & CEO AbelsonTaylor Roger Veome Regional Executive, Managing Director, Investments Alex. Brown, a Division of Raymond James Rita Sola Cook President of Bank of America Chicago Bank of America Roberto Mignone President Bridger Capital Steve Zick Vice President, Director, Christie’s Chicago Christie's Shawn Beber President & CEO CIBC Bank USA Jeremy Winter SVP, Chicago Branch Manager CNA Lisa Graham Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer ComEd, an Exelon Company Kevin Cook Chief Operating Officer, Chicago Office Edelman Michael J. Sacks CEO GCM Grosvenor Maurice Smith President, CEO and Vice Chair Health Care Service Corporation Joseph P. Gromacki Partner Jenner & Block Christopher Deveny Chairman of the Midwest Private Bank JPMorgan Chase & Co. Andrew Swinand CEO Leo Burnett Barry MacLean Chairman MacLean-Fogg Company Yutaka Otsuka Head of Chicago Branch MUFG Gary Metzner SVP Midwest Chairman Sotheby’s Pin Ni President Wanxiang America Corporation
